title: A Bitter Lullaby
lyrics:
Hey!
I don’t know what you’re thinking
I see something in your eyes
Let me be the one to dry those
Tears you hide



I know a simple song

Can’t take away the pain you feel

Like a band-aid to the soul

It could help you heal



I’ve seen darkness leading you astray

Trust your heart and find your own way



This is a song for all the broken

We gotta believe we’ll win some day

There’s always some good in all the evil

That’s just the way of life

It’s like a bitter lullaby



(Na na na, nanana, na na na

Na na na, nanana, na na na)



Heavy is the burden

For all of us on earth

Some of us do good things

Other causes hurt



What I’m trying to say is

It doesn’t matter how

We always gotta keep on moving

Gotta walk through the fire



I won’t let the darkness lead me astray no

I walk my own way



This is a song for all the broken

We gotta believe we’ll win some day

There’s always some good in all the evil

That’s just the way of life



This is your life

So live with no regrets

Yeah it’s your life

A bitter lullaby



(Na na na, nanana, na na na

Na na na, nanana, na na na)



(Na na na, nanana, na na na

Na na na, nanana, na na na)



(Na na na, nanana, na na na

Na na na, nanana, na na na)



This is a song for all the broken

We gotta believe we’ll win some day

There’s always some good in all the evil

That’s just the way of life



This is a song for all the broken

We gotta believe we’ll win some day

There’s always some good in all the evil

That’s just the way of life

It’s like a bitter lullaby
